name: Project Gravity (itch) (Games Academy)
description:
Dies ist ein Projekt welche im Rahmen der Projektarbeit der Games Academy innerhalb von 8 Wochen erstellt wurde.

Features:

Project Gravity is a 2,5 D sidescroller. In this platformer, the player moves through levels and avoids obstacles, while manipulating the gravity of the character. Run on ceilings; use abili-ties like “Haste and other interesting power-ups in order to advance.

The robolympics are an annual event, in which robots have to challenge a gruelling obstacle course. Play as Evo, master all the challenges and become the new champion.

Settings: 3 unique settings to explore: Laboratory, Factory and the Championship course.

A game by GG Interactive

Bastian Schütze, Maria Perakis, Max Lessle, Rafael Kaul, Raoul Seresse, Robin Lee
